thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel, convenient location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, convenient location - Review of Renaissance Paris Republique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SerendipFindsYou
title: Great hotel, convenient location
text: We stayed here 3 nights in February in a twin room. Room was modern, well furnished and clean. Breakfast was included in the rate and tasted great (usually cost 30 euros according to the menu). Concierge were helpful with any queries we had. Would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone looking to stay in Paris.
